name: easy-typing-obsidian
description: Autoformat your note as typing.(Auto captalize, autospace and more...)

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp styles.css main.js manifest.json '/Users/zhaihao/Library/Mobile Documents/iCloud~md~obsidian/Documents/ORISON/.obsidian/plugins/easy-typing-obsidian'
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
